title: For reconstruction/redevelopment to be undertaken by landlord/or Co-op
clause_text: For reconstruction/redevelopment to be undertaken by landlord/or Co-op. Housing society of occupiers in respect of residential buildings/chawls located on the lands of Cotton Textile Mills, the following conditions shall apply.
